features.title: Everything you need to learn smarter
features.description: MemoSpark combines cutting-edge AI with proven learning techniques to create the most effective study experience.

smart_processing.title: Smart Document Processing
smart_processing.description: Upload PDFs, images, or text documents and our AI instantly creates flashcards in multiple languages.

adaptive_learning.title: Adaptive Learning
adaptive_learning.description: Personalized spaced repetition using the SM-2 algorithm to optimize your learning efficiency.

multilingual_support.title: Multilingual Support
multilingual_support.description: Full support for English, Sinhala, and Tamil with advanced NLP processing.

progress_tracking.title: Progress Tracking
progress_tracking.description: Beautiful analytics and insights to track your learning journey and achievements.

cta.join: Join thousands of students already using MemoSpark to achieve their academic goals.
cta.access: Access your personalized flashcards and learning materials anytime, anywhere.

hero.preview_caption: Beautiful, intuitive interface for effortless learning

footer.description: Empowering learners worldwide with AI-driven flashcards and multilingual support.
